subject: Baseplate
description_text: Hi i got order #SSN3427, unfortunatily my baseplate has scratches. I'm looking for some kind of solution what can u offer. Baseplate photo in attachment

conversations.body_text:
Hi i  can't login to see ticket. I got " You are not authorised to access this portal. Kindly contact your helpdesk administrator."  when i use forget password , when i try login my e-mail is already in use.
